full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RNAM GSUM GYI GTOR CHOG RGYUN 'KHYER BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (SKYES MCHOG RDO RJE LEGS PA'I GTOR CHOG DAM CAN ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS 'DI 'DRI 'DRA BA'I CHA TSANG LA 'KHYER BDE BA TSIGS BCAD SDEBS ZHING, DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, KU S'A LI, ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BLA MA DAM PA'I GSUNG LAS BTUS TE, SHING SBRUL LHA BABS KYI DUS CHEN NYIN SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO'I MING DBANG RATNA SID DHI'I PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI A'ANAN TA'O, ,SLAR YANG CHOS SDE THAR BA GLING GI BTZAN KHANG DU GSOL KHA BAS RGYUN 'DON GYI CHED KUN DGA' ZHES PA SHING STAG GI LO DAM CAN NOR LHA'I MNGON RTOGS SOGS GSAR DU BCUG PA DZA YANTU, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
